events.name: Study Jam - Kubernetes (POSTPONED)
events.description:
Hi All. We were going to kick off GDG Portsmouth with a Study Jam on Kubernetes Feb 16th but our facility fell through. We're looking diligently for a replacement venue but more than likely we'll need to push this meetup out a week or two. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Hopefully it is not too late to find something else fun to do this weekend! We'll keep you posted. Stay tuned!

-----------------------------------------------------------

We're going to kick off GDG Portsmouth NH with what we call a Study Jam. What is a Study Jam you may ask? Well, basically we grab a 4 hour block of time on a Saturday and start working our way through a course/quest on Qwiklabs.com. This year we're aiming to host 4 of these events. The topics will be Kubernetes, IoT, Machine Learning and Security. Stay tuned for the official announcement of topic, time and location. I promise you won't have to wait too long. Feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions.

events.name: Droidcon Boston 2019 - 20% off Code
events.description:
Hi All,

Quick update. Early Bird pricing ends April 1st (no joke). The 20% off should be on top of that.

GDG Portsmouth now has a Droidcon Boston 2019 discount code. 20% off up until the day of the event.

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/droidcon-boston-2019-tickets-51797973132?discount=GDG-Portsmouth-20-Off

Droidcon is a global developer conference series and networking event focused on the best of Android. The idea behind Droidcon is to support the Android platform and create a strong network for developers and companies.

The 3rd edition of Droidcon Boston takes place from April 08-09, 2019 at the Calderwood Pavillion. Droidcon Boston 2018 had over 30 speakers presenting over 2 days, as well as birds of a feather sessions, four workshops, and a party!

Droidcon Boston is part of the global Droidcon community with over 20 Droidcons organized worldwide in 2018.

events.name: ODSC East 2019 - Hynes Convention Center - 20% off
events.description:
**ODSC discount changed again. ODSC is now offering 10% off. This means you can still get 20% off using the links at the bottom of this message.

This is not an 'official' Meetup for our group but since I have an extra 10% discount off of current prices, and there might be some here interested in data science, I'd thought I'd share. Right now, ODSC tickets are 20% off using the links at the end of this post. When this sale ends they decrease the discount further. You'll still be able to get the extra 10% off but it will be off a higher priced ticket. Find the links at the end of this post.

NOTE: When you click the link the Eventbrite page says 10% off. It's because they are using one page for everyone. The pricing, however, will include the extra 10% off. Let me know if you have any problems.

-------------------------------------------

ODSC East 2019
Boston
April 30 - May 3rd
Hynes Convention Center

ODSC East 2019 is one of the largest applied data science conferences in the world. Our speakers include some of the core contributors to many open source tools, libraries, and languages. Attend ODSC East 2019 and learn the latest AI & data science topics, tools, and languages from some of the best and brightest minds in the field.

--------------------------------------------

ODSC East 2019 - Open Data Science Conference
https://bit.ly/2FZPnuL

ODSC Accelerate AI Business Summit 2019 in Boston
https://bit.ly/2MBI8tl

events.name: Field Trip to Google I/O Extended 2019 @Google Cambridge (Invite Only)
events.description:
BY INVITE ONLY: Field trip to Google I/O Extended event at Google in Cambridge, MA. This is an all-day event on Tues May 7, 2019. Google I/O is the yearly 3-day festival in CA to roll out new Google technology and plans.

We received a few tickets to this private event at Google's Kendall Sq location on the first day of I/O. Regional I/O Extended events share some of this with local communities.

You must fill out the interest form, below, in order to have a chance.
(Don't RSVP on this meetup. The RSVP wait list won't get you a chance to attend)

The May 7th MA event will have the Google I/O live Stream, a talks by Cambridge based Googlers, great food, swag, and networking in the heart of Kendall Square. This is a FREE event but attendance is by invitation, only.

If you're a member of this GDG and you want to go then please fill out the Google form ASAP (by 7 pm Sun Apr 28) at this link:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1w-8oMHnqJsc_Ebin3qHepew6cYO3v5YLVnwwY75X5M4

If there's more interest than available tickets then the our organizers will prioritize requests based on GDG event participation, interests, and reasons for attending. You'll receive an email from us if you're selected. Good luck!

We'll arrange car pooling for those selected.

You can learn more about Google I/O 2019 and also follow along with main I/O event in Mountain View, CA via the link, below. Many sessions will be live streamed and available, later.

https://events.google.com/io/
